name: Momentum (itch) (verysoftwares)
description:
early access playtest build. consider supporting.

LÖVE remake of an older Flash game of mine. arrow keys or A/D to move, Shift to use block-breaking powerups. 

starting from 2000 points, a new block and powerup will spawn every 1000 points.

don't get crushed between blocks nor fall out of the room! post your high scores in the comments :)
